oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clemons Elementary School, Nashville, Tennessee, 1980 August
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An exterior view of old Clemons Elementary School, located at 2225 12th Avenue South, Nashville, Tennessee, circa August 1980. The school was named for Miss Emma B. Clemons, the first woman principal in Nashville. The building was razed circa 1982. Forms part of the Claynita Harris Slide Collection. The original is a 35 mm color transparency (2 x 2 in. slide mount)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Clemons Elementary School (Nashville, Tenn.)
